text: Castolus or Kastolos () was a town of ancient Lydia. Xenophon says that king Darius II appointed his brother Cyrus the Younger, commander of all the forces that muster at the plain of Castolus (Castoli Campus; Καστωλοῦ πεδίον). The site of the plain of Castolus is fixed as the Burçak Ovası; the site of the town is unknown. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Lydia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
